text: Sarafina! is a 1992 South African British American French musical movie directed by Darrell Roodt and was based on the 1987 musical of the same name. It stars Whoopi Goldberg, Mary Twala, Leleti Khumalo, Miriam Makeba and John Kani and was distributed by Walt Disney Pictures and Hollywood Pictures and Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 musical movies Category:South African movies Category:British musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:French musical movies Category:Movies about Apartheid Category:Movies directed by Darrell Roodt Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Disney movies Category:1990s musical movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:1992 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:French comedy movies
title: Sarafina! (movie)
